summary:
Adds Aernil, a male Thalmor Follower.
You can find him in the Winking Skeever Inn in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
As requested by @Superdude (at steam workshop) I made a Thalmor follower. 
His name is Aernil. He is modded to be part of the Thalmor, 
so if you attack the Thalmor in his presence he will most likely try to kill you. 
You can find him in the Winking Skeever Inn in Solitude. 
He doesn't trigger traps, he levels with the player and you can marry him. 
He is skilled in Destruction,Conjuration,Alteration and Sneak.

If he has darker face than the rest of the body try This: open the console click on the NPC with the issue and type setnpcweight 50 and hit enter.

Feel free to make requests.
author: gtantsa
